subject: Speaking of buzzing..
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
--0-393928538-1187062663=:42105
Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="0-1717165105-1187062663=:42105"


--0-1717165105-1187062663=:42105
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Since we are on the subject of buzz I figured I would throw in my recording session from yesterday. I woke up to a guy with a chainsaw on my roof right above my bedroom chopping up a limb that fell off the tree beside the house. Rude awakening yes. So I got up and was sitting here thinking that sounds very strange. I kept hearing weird mumble jumble behind the chainsaw. I thought I must not be awake yet so I hit record...just in case I was awake. I was.
   
  Those of you who have your group setting set to "individual emails" will get the attached files. For the rest of you I might upload them all later. Enjoy if you can hear it =)
   
  Misty

       
---------------------------------
Sick sense of humor? Visit Yahoo! TV's Comedy with an Edge to see what's on, when.
